name: Quinoa Pilaf with Veggies and Chickpeas
author: Ashley Hume Saar
summary: Delicious gluten-free side or main dish!
ingredients: 1 (14.5 ounce) can chickpeas, drained and rinsed
salt and ground black pepper to taste
1 tablespoon balsamic vinegar, or more to taste  (Optional)
directions: Combine chicken stock and quinoa in a saucepan and bring to a boil
Reduce heat to medium-low, cover, and simmer until quinoa is tender, about 15 minutes
Heat olive oil in a large skillet over medium heat until shimmering
Add asparagus, bell peppers, and onion; cook and stir until softened, about 6 minutes
Pour in 2 tablespoons balsamic vinegar and cook until reduced, about 4 minutes
Add lemon juice, salt, and black pepper
Drizzle 1 tablespoon balsamic vinegar over pilaf before serving
